response.explain: The previous action code successfully put the kale into the saucepot. The next step is to put the saucepot into the oven. However, the oven is currently closed, so we need to open the oven first.
response.subtask:
(1) Open the oven
(2) Put the saucepot into the oven
(3) Turn on the oven to cook the kale
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
    # Subtask 1: Open the oven
    oven = registry(env,"oven_wuinhm_0")
    open(robot, oven)
    donothing(env)
